alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:32PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Thunderstorms producing heavy rain will impact portions of northwestern Linn, southern Buchanan and northeastern Benton Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 330 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of showers and thunderstorms near Rowley, or 8 miles south of Independence, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lacalized flooding due to heavy rainfall. Locations impacted include... Brandon. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 45 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
